question: Choose the incorrect statement:
option1: Epsom salt is an ore containing Sodium
option2: Bauxite is an ore of Aluminium
option3: Asbestos is an ore containing Calcium
answer: Epsom salt is an ore containing Sodium
explanation: Epsom salt is an ore containing Magnesium. It is also known as the heptahydrate sulfate mineral. Its chemical formula is MgSO<sub>4</sub>Â·7H<sub>2</sub>O.
